data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Aude, Occitanie, France to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Aude, Occitanie, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 222,226 cultural Christians in the county of Aude to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.section_summary: On average, 23 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Aude, Occitanie, France.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Aude, Occitanie, France. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Aude. Through your servants plant 72 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Iu Mien people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Aude to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 4,465 believers in Aude.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,465 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
